name: Prince Kymar

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally SPD in the Arena by 30%.

skills.name: Phantom Fire
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Places a 5% [Poison] debuff for 1 turn if this attack is critical.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%

skills.name: Abyssal Gaze
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Removes all buffs. Places a [Sleep] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Seal of Magic
skills.raw_description:
Resets the cooldowns of all ally skills. Fills the Turn Meter of all allies except this Champion by 20%.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
